body.p:
i have got all your letters and life of john brown and all the money and comes real good I can tell you i just about get dreaned and that fechesfetches me quite right again we thought you would be through this week and should begin to look for you home but your letter says you are not) we are all pretty well I am well i had A pery bad cold and coughf cough when Jeffy wrote and had been cleaning house and worked very hard but i am well now Eddy is some lame yet he cant can't doo do much I think its it's the rheumattis Andrew has got quite well he has been here three days in sucsessionsuccession he and jim I ll I'll tell you walt all about family affairs and then I ll I'll touch on not the fight nor politickspolitics) well we scrach scratch along the same as usual I paid the rent the month of april April the 5 you sent me and what Georg vannostrand paid me but i am in debt to ammerman about 10 dollar dollars not lately but when mary was here I had to get so many things if that was paid I would
feel releivedrelieved but I cant can't see any way at present so we ll hope for the best we like the people that has taken the house very well A man and wife and one son 17 and one 9 years all but the 9 year one belongs to mr beachersbeechers church she is a long island woman and very clever they have the back bacement basement and the next flour floor through and one bedroom in the attic for 14 dollars per month we are a little crampt cramped in the basement we miss the water but we ll we 'll do the best we can they want gass gas very much but I did not promice promise it when they hired) George vannostrand paid me one night and left next morning without any ceremony we expected him again left his things here but he has not been) Fred and bob coopper was here last sunday Sunday staid stayed till toward evening) and Hector TindaleTyndale was here last week he looks very fat and well and behaved very friendly indeed talked much of his mother says she died of gout in the stomach she was not at his house but at her daughters he said he was from home the Doctor said there was no danger when he went she died before his return he thought you had forgotten him or you would have sent him a few lines my pen is so bad
